text:
@narendramodi Dear Prime Minister Sir we need your valuable 15 minutes to brief you on "Azad Corona Mission" Project. 

Our team has developed a next level strategy on "how to search & fight with Covid-19 and to return back economy on track in quick time." 

Kindly allow us

Jaihind!
